sections.heading: Getting Started with Streamlit
sections.content: Streamlit is an open-source Python library that makes it easy to create and share beautiful, custom web apps for machine learning and data science. Install with pip install streamlit, then create your first app with st.write('Hello World').

sections.heading: API Rate Limiting - Security
sections.content: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage. Common strategies include token bucket, sliding window, and fixed window algorithms. Return 429 Too Many Requests with Retry-After header.

sections.heading: Kubernetes ConfigMaps - Configuration
sections.content: ConfigMaps store non-confidential configuration data as key-value pairs. They can be consumed by Pods as environment variables, command-line arguments, or configuration files in volumes.
